processing_structure.text: Clarify input and output: one integer, output sum of its divisors
Loop from 1 to the input value to find divisors

advice.text: You have started coding but the main loop and output are not written yet; focus on translating the remaining comments into code.
Think of the loop as: for each i from 1 to n, check a condition and update sum when the condition is true.
Implement a for-loop that iterates i = 1..n; inside, if n modulo i equals zero then add i to sum; after the loop, print the sum.
